page.title: 12SHERWOOD COURT
page.content: Sherwood Court is a residential home for twenty four elderly people. The home is divided into three units with eight people in each unit. Each resident has their own bed sitting room and each unit shares a lounge/ dining area. Resident's laundry is done on the premises. The staff consists of an officer in charge, two qualified nurses, three part time care staff,four domestics, two cooks, one clerical worker and a handyman. A hairdresser visits the home twice a week. A shop trolley is available each day and there is a public telephone. The home is attended by Doctors from the local Health Centre. Visitors are welcome at anytime and residents are encouraged to take an interest in the local community. Entertainment for residents includes television, films, bingo and outings.
